contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|definition}} Generally, a '''[[definition]]''' delimits or describes the meaning of a concept or term. '''Definition''' may also refer one of the following. == Science, mathematics and computing== * In computer programming languages, a [[declaration (computer programming)|declaration]] that reserves memory for a variable or gives the body of a subroutine * [[Defining equation (physics)]], physical quantities defined in terms of others, in the form of an equation * [[Defining equation (physical chemistry)]], physico-chemical quantities defined in terms of others, in the form of an equation * [[Dynamical system (definition)]], description of a mathematical model, determined by a system of coupled [[differential equations]] * [[Definition (Mathematics)]] :* [[Intensional definition]] :* [[Elementary definition]] :* [[Algebraic definition]] :* [[Recursive definition]] :* [[Field of definition]] :* A [[continuous]] function. :* A [[well-defined]] function. == Music and TV == * [[Definition (album)|''Definition'' (album)]], a 1992 studio album by American crossover thrash band Dirty Rotten Imbeciles * [[Definition (TV series)|''Definition'' (TV series)]], a long-running Canadian game show of the 1970s and 1980s * [[Definition (EP)|''Definition'' (EP)]], a 2001 EP by punk rock band Jersey * [[Definition (song)|''Definition'' (song)]], a 1998 song by Black Star * [[Defined (album)]], a 2005 operatic pop album * [[Definitions (How I Met Your Mother)]], a 2009 television episode == Other == * [[Definitions (Plato)]], a dictionary of about 185 philosophical terms sometimes included in the corpus of Plato's works * [[Dogmatic definition]], the pronunciation of religious doctrine by a Pope or an ecumenical council {{disambiguation}}
